items.content_html: A modern Pokédex built with Angular 16 and Angular Material, featuring dynamic search, detailed Pokémon info, lazy-loaded images, and a responsive UI. Optimized with Lazy Loading, lightweight animations, and Jest unit tests. Showcases best practices, performance, and clean modular design.

Optimized with Lazy Loading, lightweight animations, and Jest unit tests. Showcases best practices, performance, and clean modular design.
